mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, shop_id, prod_id, product_name, product_img, product_desc, product_type_id, product_type, shop_prod_status
mapper.select: select temp.shop_id, temp.shop_name, temp.prod_id, temp.product_name, temp.product_img, temp.product_type_id, sum(temp.market_price) market_price, sum(temp.price) price, ifnull(sum(op.prod_num), 0) sellnum from ( select sp.shop_id, s.shop_name, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_type_id, ifnull(min(ps.market_price), 0) as market_price, ifnull(min(sps.price), 0) as price from shop_product sp left join product_spec ps on ps.product_id = sp.prod_id and ps.del_flag = 0 left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.prod_spec_id = ps.id left join shop s on s.id = sp.shop_id where sp.shop_id = #{shopId} group by ps.sku_id limit 80 ) temp left join order_product op on temp.prod_id = op.shop_prod_id and op.del_flag = 0 group by temp.prod_id order by sellnum desc limit 16

select * from ( select temp.shop_id, temp.shop_name, temp.prod_id, temp.product_name, temp.product_img, temp.product_type_id, sum(market_price) as market_price, sum(price) as price from ( select sp.shop_id, s.shop_name, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_type_id, ifnull(min(ps.market_price), 0) as market_price, ifnull(min(sps.price), 0) as price from shop_product sp left join product_spec ps on ps.product_id = sp.prod_id and ps.del_flag = 0 left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.prod_spec_id = ps.id left join shop s on s.id = sp.shop_id where sp.shop_prod_status = 1 and sp.del_flag = 0 group by ps.sku_id, sp.shop_id order by RAND() limit 50 ) temp group by temp.prod_id ) t

select * from ( select temp.shop_id, temp.prod_id, temp.product_name, temp.product_img, temp.product_type_id, sum(temp.market_price) as market_price, sum(temp.price) as price from ( select sp.shop_id, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_type_id, ifnull(min(ps.market_price), 0) as market_price, ifnull(min(sps.price), 0) as price from shop_product sp left join product_spec ps on ps.product_id = sp.prod_id and ps.del_flag = 0 left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.prod_spec_id = ps.id left join product_glance_over pgo on sp.prod_id = pgo.prod_id and pgo.del_flag = 0 where pgo.customer_id = #{userId} and sp.shop_prod_status = 1 and sp.del_flag = 0 group by ps.sku_id, sp.shop_id order by pgo.times desc limit 50 ) temp group by temp.prod_id ) t

select sp.id, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_desc, sp.shop_id, sp.product_type_id, sp.product_type, sps.price as spsPrice, ps.id as skuId, ps.sku_name as skuName, sps.prod_spec_id, sps.id as shop_prod_spec_id, sps.spec_name, sps.sku_id, sps.stock, psp.market_price as spsMarketPrice
from shop_product sp left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.shop_prod_id = sp.prod_id and sps.del_flag = 0 left join product_sku ps on ps.id = sps.sku_id and ps.del_flag = 0 left join product_spec psp on psp.id = sps.prod_spec_id and psp.del_flag = 0 where sp.id = #{id}

select temp.id, temp.shop_id, temp.shop_name, temp.address, temp.prod_id, temp.product_name, temp.product_img, temp.product_type_id, temp.product_type, temp.lng, temp.lat, '' as product_desc, sum(market_price) as market_price, sum(price) as price from ( select sp.id, s.lat, s.lng, s.id as shop_id, s.shop_name, concat(s.province, s.city, s.district, s.address) as address, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, sp.product_type_id, sp.product_type, min(ps.market_price) as market_price, min(sps.price) as price from shop s left join shop_product sp on s.id = sp.shop_id and sp.shop_prod_status = 1 and sp.del_flag = 0 left join product_spec ps on ps.product_id = sp.prod_id and ps.del_flag = 0 left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.prod_spec_id = ps.id where s.id = #{shopId} and s.del_flag = 0 group by ps.sku_id ) temp group by temp.id

select temp.id, temp.shopId, temp.shop_name, temp.prod_id, temp.product_name, temp.product_img, temp.lat, temp.lng, temp.product_type_id, temp.product_type, sum(market_price) as market_price, sum(price) as price from ( select s.id as shopId, s.shop_name, sp.id, sp.prod_id, sp.product_name, sp.product_img, s.lng, s.lat, sp.product_type_id, sp.product_type, min(ps.market_price) as market_price, min(sps.price) as price from shop s left join shop_product sp on s.id = sp.shop_id and sp.shop_prod_status = 1 and sp.del_flag = 0 left join product_spec ps on ps.product_id = sp.prod_id and ps.del_flag = 0 left join shop_product_spec sps on sps.prod_spec_id = ps.id and sps.del_flag = 0 where s.id = #{shopId} and sp.product_name like concat('%', #{productName}, '%') and s.del_flag = 0 group by ps.sku_id ) temp group by temp.id

select sp.product_name from shop_product sp inner join orders o on o.shop_id = sp.shop_id and o.del_flag = 0 where o.shop_id = #{shopId} and o.order_status = 100 and sp.del_flag = 0 group by o.id order by count(1) desc limit 10
